评论详情: My son says these are the most comfortable shes he has ever had. He has had in the past most , if not all mainstream brands. These are great
excellent fit. toes are thanking me!
The material is very stretchy and makes it hard to tighten the shoe past a certain point.

评论概述: Great value and alternative to Vivo
评论详情: Having a hard time justifying $100 for a pair of vivo barefoot? These do just as fine and cost 1/3. Love taking these on trips since they pack small and light, or can slip on and off going thru tsa
Fit well

评论概述: All it needs to be is wider
评论详情: The knit barefoot shoes offer an impressive blend of comfort and minimalism, with their lightweight, breathable knit material and ultra-thin sole delivering a natural, almost sock-like feel. They excel in providing a close-to-ground experience, making them a fantastic option for those seeking to replicate barefoot movement. However, the design falls short in one critical area: width. Despite their otherwise thoughtful construction, these shoes lack the spacious toe box typically associated with barefoot footwear, leaving the fit too narrow for those with wider feet. While they shine in comfort and flexibility, their limited width diminishes the overall appeal, especially for wearers prioritizing natural foot splay.
Excellent. I put arch inserts and the snug fit is perfect. Feet feel better.

I was ecstatic when I found this shoe. The look and construction are high quality, easily matching the more premium barefoot brands retailing for double or more. Unfortunately, these shoes are extremely narrow and stiff. Be very cautious before purchasing if your feet are even normal width, let alone wide.  When I first put the shoe on, I was sure I had gotten the wrong size. But alas, as good as the shoes look, they were terribly designed from a functional standpoint.  The search continues…

These fit my feet so much better than the vivos that look just like these. The vivo sizing is weird as I have to pull the laces so tight and they still are too loose and long, but these FIT LIKE A GLOVE!!!! I also like the bit of padding in the back!
Nice shoes and no socks needed
Are exactly as advertised and work well.  Good support.

I’ve tried many “barefoot shoes” and most are over priced and do not have the comfort of these at all ! Being a surfer/athlete and not liking shoes at all . I highly  recommend  these ! True  to size and very lightweight & comfortable. Will be purchasing more for sure !
I was worried these shoes would hurt my feet over time, in fact did the opposite, my feet haven’t felt better and are more sore when I wear regular tennis shoes and even dress shoes.

评论概述: Move over, other knockoffs! There's a new king in town
评论详情: I've tried, used and abused a wide variety of the barefoot shoes available on Amazon, and this is by far the best I've experienced in terms of quality, fit, and comfort. I will 100% be purchasing another pair.  If I were to compare these to a super-expensive name brand counterpart, this is very similar to a Vivobarefoot. While these are primarily advertised as a gym shoe, I use these for daily activity, and it's the closest I've gotten to that literal barefoot feel.  I typically hover between an 11 and a 12 depending on the manufacturer. 11 for barefoot shoes, and 12 for "traditional" shoes. I found the 12 to be quite loose, so I returned and purchased an 11, which I found to be just a little bit tight around my big toe when new. Fortunately, I was able to break them in very quickly.
Really comfy, and surprisingly good quality for the price. The toe box is a little narrow for a barefoot shoe, but the fit is nice. Worth it. Probably gonna get it in white next.
Comfortable, great color. Size is like half more than expected but still very comfortable and worth the price
The laces come installed pretty tight, loosen them up. I like the look of these shoes
Fine if you don't care about having a wide toe box, which is a huge part of zero drop shoes IMO.  I returned them.
Average shoe. so far comfortable, but I'm not a runner.  If you are, you might want a little more quality and support.

评论概述: Narrow, stiff. Not a vivobarefoot or Merrill vaporglove replacement.
评论详情: The soles are thinner than other barefoot shoes, but somehow stiffer. The walls on the sole (vertical part) is so stiff it cuts into your foot if it’s not wide enough for your foot, which it likely will be. The front point is decent.  Narrower than other barefoot shoes. As wide as normal shoes.  Great looking like vivobarefoot at a fraction of the price… just not good for normal to wide feet.
Great shoes super comfortable.
I got them for my husband about 3 months ago and he loves them and says his feet feel way better!!!
Perfect shoe/sneaker for comfort
No de muy buena calidad su construcción, los tome para el diario; pero no los compraria de nuevo. Mas ancho de lo que decia su "guia de tallas".
They are true to size very light and airy shoe great for a runner or a summer shoe very flexible
My new favorite shoes, getting a 2nd color.

These are some of the best barefoot shoes I’ve owned for the price. I have several (popular) barefoot brands and these feel the exact same if not better.  I’m extremely happy with these shoes, and I’ve gotten compliments. I will be buying more.
Rubs a little bit consider wearing higher socks than ankle socks.
This shoes feels very comfortable, good looking, and zero drop.  But for running, it is not as good as Whitin running shoes, for knee pain free run.

评论概述: Great zero drop shoes that are comfortable and durable
评论详情: Most of the time I buy zero drop shoes from a known athletic brand. I was curious when I saw these and ordered them. I am truly impressed with how comfortable these are. Remember that there is no tongue, just the enclosed shoe that stretches to get your feet in and laces to ensure tight fit. I have been wearing them for walks (3 to 4 miles per day). They are on the heavy side for this profile of shoes. That could be because of the dense rubber sole which also causes the shoes to be less cushioning than other in the same category. With that said, the rest is very positive. I could wear these for hours at a time. There are no pinching points, no rubbing to cause blisters. They are very flexible and provide great stability while exercising.

The padding on the are nonexistent.  I ended up having to go and get some insole inserts to make these wearable.  Once I did that, they became my daily throw on shoes to run errands, get the mail, etc.  but let me tell you, without that extra padding, I felt EVERYTHING that was on the ground.  Even the tiniest pebble felt like a nail on the bottom of my foot.  That said, an inexpensive insole made all the difference  and I now really like these, but I shouldn’t have had to get something like that for a brand new pair of shoes.
Very nicely made running shoes, I like that they are light, and of course the color is awesome

评论概述: Great stylish shoe for the price, however there are stress points.
评论详情: Love the function, style and fit but durability is questionable.  Had to Xero shoes for 3 years and still going strong but needed a bigger size.  Big part of its durability is how the sole is attached to the knit material.  With the Airhas shoe, when flexed, you can see where the material is stressed and will likely tear or become detached from the sole.  With the Xero shoes there are no stress points.
buen producto

Pumped on these shoes! Like the color of the light grey and white. The zero drop is noticeably better than any of my other workout shoes and after hitting legs today no more back pain/irritation in these shoes. Oddly, the 10.5 run a touch big but think that the 10s may be a little too snug. Fairly true to size but curious how the 10s would work (wear 10.5 in 90% of my other shoes). First workout in and will see how they hold up over time. So far impressed with the style, feel and bang for you buck.

The AIRHAS Men's Barefoot Shoes Zero Drop Running Shoes is not like regular shoes.  It took a day or two to get used to.  The barefoot thing is a strange concept for me.  But nevertheless, the shoe turns out pretty good.  It is easy to put on and it stays on.  Your footstep will be louder than usual wearing these, but they feel good and they look great!!

I got these specifically for leg day at the gym. I was looking for a shoe that wouldn't contort my foot or ankle into an unnatural position. I picked these because the sole comes up over the foot bed in places that you may want a little more stability and the heel is not rounded over at the back so you feel more planted. These shoes delivered on what I was looking for and I like the feel enough to want to wear them outside of the gym too. The cushioned heel counter is a big plus as well. Only con I've found is that they like to try to slip off your foot at more extreme extensions, it would be nice if there was a way to lace them so that your heel is more locked in. Super pleased other than that though.

I wouldn't say they fall into the ultra barefoot category, however they look and wear awesome. Super comfortable. They accommodate wide feet well with an almost "barefoot" shape.  Seemingly good value. Will have to see how long term durability fares.

评论概述: Cómodos, suela suave y cumple excelente con todos los requisitos para el precio del articulo
评论详情: Desde el momento que te los pones sientes la comodidad de tu pie se ajustan perfectamente y sientes como si anduvieras descalzo hasta parece que fueran otros tennis más caros, a mi en lo personal me encantaron y voy encargar otros dos parejas de perdida. No le piden nada a los vivo barefoot.

评论概述: Long Time Vivo Wearer Reconsidering Amazon Options
评论详情: I've been wearing Vivo's since 2018 and I've got to say that these are surprisingly up to par feel wise, time will tell if they are as durable as Vivos. But for $38, I don't know if I'll be making more investment into Vivo or any major 'barefoot' shoe when there are options that are a FRACTION of the price here on Amazon. This is my 2nd pair of 'barefoot' shoes, the other brand being TSLA. I had to size up though, typically I'm a size 10 in Vivo, I had to get a size 11 for this brand. These also look like kinda like Kobe 11 Low's which is great since I was a huge sneakerhead before I went barefoot sneakers. Overall I'm satisfied with purchase, I just wish they offered white/white! Looking forward to purchasing more if they hold up AIRHAS!
Zapatos muy bien fabricados, se ven muy bien, son muy comodos, los recomiendo. La talla  bien segun la  guia de tamaños.

评论概述: Pretty good but not the widest.
评论详情: Good zero drop shoes especially for the money. They don't have a traditional tongue which was surprising; the entire upper is once piece but you don't notice it while wearing. It's easy to slip the shoes on and off (they're almost like socks) and I really like the pull tab they added, though we'll have to see the durability. I like the vinyl toe and heel covers -- can we get more of this in the barefoot world please? They come with a simple foam insole which is thin enough to give you ground feel but not too thick and there's also some nice padding around the back of the heel as well. It feels built well enough.  Like other reviews mention there's some extra pointy room ahead of your big toe and the toe box isn't particularly wide (I got a 10.5 US M which is my normal sneaker size) but they fit well in width for the rest of the foot. In Whitins I can splay my toes all I want but I can see my pinky in particular rubbing at full splay with these but its not terrible. If you're considering sizing down to mitigate the extra pointiness, don't. I also think they look way sharper than the whitins I have. The tags are reflective FYI.  Overall, a pretty good shoe esp. for the price.

评论概述: Not bad, but not very athletic
评论详情: These shoes fit well, are comfortable, and obviously a minimalist style shoe. The thing is when you do anything athletic in them involving lateral movements - these do not stand a chance. The knit material allowed your feet to shift too much and too easily causing higher potential to roll an ankle. If you get these for just walking or casual use - they're great. Athletic use, and you're looking for an ankle injury.

These shoes fit fine and are comfortable with our without socks. However I wasn't impressed with the overall materials, they are sort of flexible,rubbery all over. Fine for easy summer wear for the price when I needed more on my feet than just flip flops.

I have a river behind my ranch, and we do a lot of kayaking there. I got these IRHAS Men's Barefoot Shoes Zero Drop Running Shoes to try at kayaking, and they worked fantastic. I took the shoelaces off and liked them better without the laces. They are easy to put on and take off. They fit and feel comfortable, and they grip well in the kayak and on our boat. I really like these shoes, I would get them again.

First off these look way better and way more normal than any other pair of barefoot shoes that I've owned. Most pairs are dorky and obviously "different" than a normal shoe. The fact that its all woven too ise nice because it means its less likely to just fall apart compared to shoes that all glued together, and its more form fitting without rubbing because the top is basically a sock. THis is VERY similar to some vivobarefoot shoes and has some of the same issues.  Initially I was concerned I needed another half size or up would maybe return them because the tongue of the shoe felt tight and stiff. Maybe it would loosen up but I didn't like how much pressure it put on the front where my foot meets my shin. This is true of the leather vivobarefoots I bought for work and stopped wearing. Fortunately I remembed I can pull out the insole which I prefer anyway to get a more barefoot feeling. With the insole out they feel way better and I'm now likely going to get at least one more pair in another color. I wish they had all black (which is now instock in my size). I'll leave another review after putting some miles on them, but I think I'll like these way more than some other shoes I've spent over $100 that fell apart and had other issues (looking at you Xero and vivobarefoot)  The tongue is still stiff. The sizing sticker fell off the but left some of the vinyl or adhesive. The tonge got a little more comfortable when that happened and I suspect itll be better when it comes all the way off.  One thing to note is that the stretchy knit does make this a little more unstable if you were to use them on hills. Without the insole its easy for your toes to slide to the side and its so stretchy the shoe will kind of roll underneath your goot even when laced nice. I imagine thats less likely to happen with the insoles since they cup your feet but those are flat by the toes so perhaps not. Either way, I'm mainly using them for disc golf and daily wear. I'll use something else when I'm hiking and the like so it isn't an issue for me.

If they made a size 15 mens, I'd buy them in every color. I bought a 14 and they are a little snug, so sadly I need to send them back. However, when I opened the package I was pleasantly surprised. They come in a box, not just some little poly bag. And the build quality looks every bit as good as any big name brand shoe. The material quality is excellent, and the design is phenomenal. They would be great for exercise, but I would wear them for every day wear too. So sad they don't have a 15.

I have a good amount of zero drop wide shoes now to make a pretty good comparison to. These are good shoes. I will say that I think they look more shoe like in the product page. When I got them, I though they looked more water shoe like, than running shoe or trainer. They are comfortable and look better than some of my other minimalist shoes do. They're super light weight, and super flexible. I imagine they would be very breathable too. I wouldn't go for a hike in them, but for just about anything else, I think they'd be fine. My only real gripe about them is the front or top of the sock part. It's a bit stiff and comes up a little to high. It would rub right above my no-show socks. Other than that, I really like them.

评论概述: May differ person to person, but i love the zero drop
评论详情: the zero drop design really makes a difference in my workouts, especially during deadlifts and squats. the zero drop is perfect for me for lifting.  initially, the fit felt a bit snug, but after a couple of uses, they broke in nicely. the minimalist design means you can really feel the ground, which is great for balance and stability. they're also lightweight, so it feels like i'm not wearing shoes at all sometimes.  on the downside, the lack of cushioning might take some getting used to if you're transitioning from regular running shoes. also, wouldn't recommend them for long runs on hard surfaces – my feet felt a bit sore after a few miles on pavement.

Good quality lightweight men’s sneaker.  Fit is true to size (14).  Fit is tight but comfortable and slips on easily.  Great sneaker for someone who doesn’t like to display strong branding but appreciates a stylish sneaker.

评论概述: The zero-drop design has made a noticeable difference.
评论详情: I've been on the hunt for a minimalist shoe that would let my feet breathe and move naturally, and these barefoot shoes are a total game-changer. The wide-toe box feels amazing, it's like my feet are finally free after years of being cramped in traditional sneakers. The zero-drop design has made a noticeable difference in my posture and balance, especially during workouts.  Plus, they're incredibly lightweight and flexible, which I love. The only thing I'd mention is that if you're used to heavily cushioned shoes, it might take a little time to adjust to the minimal feel. But trust me, once you do, you won't look back. These shoes have become my go-to for any activity where I want to feel grounded and connected to the ground.
These shoes fit true to size, they feel nice on and they seem decently made. They look very similar to the product photos. I'm happy with them.

These are a really nice pair of super lightweight gym shoes.  I love the way they slip on with the very stretchy material.  The feel on the feet is very good, comfortable if a bit hard. I don't even need my insoles to wear these in good comfort. I will be trying them out at the gym, I have actually made these my "house shoes" because of how comfortable they are.  Easy to use, comfortable and a great fit on my size 12 feet.

These are for my husband and he absolutely loves them. He says they're cute also comfortable.  They fit really good. The color is also nice.  The material is soft. The shoes are light weight. Definitely recommend by us. Awesome walking shoes.

My son has been wanting these like forever! He’ll wear them on his days off! They are a running shoe or cross trainer, sized normal…he wears a 13 and they fit really well! It has a wide toe box too. They look really nice too!

Cheap and good looking (compared to most of the others). Best to approach the barefoot world. Still using them during the winter with thick socks. Only minus: the sole is a bit slippery but I guess it's also part of the game, since it's very thin.
